en: What will you be doing for your birthday?
I plan on having a small get-together with my closest friends.
I want to see my family but they live too far away.
ko: 가족들도 보고 싶긴 한데 너무 멀리 살아

en: What are you going to do with your friends?
We'll go out to eat and have some drinks like we always do.
ko: 그냥 평소처럼 맛있는거 먹고 술 한잔할 거 같아

en: I really want to go have some good quality food.
ko: 진짜 맛있고 좋은 거 먹고 싶어

en: What do you want for your birthday?
ko: 생일 선물 뭐 갖고 싶은 거 없어?

en: I either want cash or a gift card because I get to go buy whatever I want and not be disappointed with their gifts.
ko: 현금이나 상품권 받고 싶어 선물에 실망할 걱정도 없고 내가 사고 싶은 거 살 수 있잖아
